clients.title: Piscataqua Marina
clients.description: This was built for a local marina changing ownership and looking for a new website.

projects.title: The Fickle Parent
projects.description: My bootcamp final project. A journal and kid ranking system for parents. No need to guess who your favorite is, the data doesn't lie.
projects.tools: React | PostgreSQL | Apache | PHP | ChartJS | SendGrid | Firebase Authentication

projects.title: Linden Commons Treasure Hunt
projects.description: COVID-19 is challenging so I taught myself Vue.js whenever the kids were napping. I hid stamps around the neighborhood and built an app for them to go 'treasure' hunting.

projects.title: Vulture
projects.description: A tongue in cheek app to help people in an office find leftover food from meetings.

projects.title: World Explorer
projects.description: Group project allowing users to save, like, and favorite different locations. I built the search and filter functionality, as well as the like and heart functionality.

projects.title: Llam-o-rama
projects.description: Due to timing constraints my partner's original brilliant llama dating site was turned into a llama themed online store.

mographProjects.title: Adam & Eve Music Video
mographProjects.description: Project for a local musician. I wanted to combine live footage with my mograph project. I had my second child during this project, which made finding free time a bit of a challenge.

mographProjects.title: 2018 MBCC Promo
mographProjects.description: I volunteered to create this promo for the Massachusetts Breast Cancer Coalition. I also made a spanish version.

mographProjects.title: Futura Project
mographProjects.description: A fun project for a course I was taking in video production. In theory this was based on the font type Futura, but I came up with the idea first then figured a way to connect it to the font.

mographProjects.title: Demon Face
mographProjects.description: Just a simple test to see if I could learn how to do some face distortion. Sound effects added for the heck of it. Don't be scared.
